document_data.mainbody:
Netty was a friend of Footy who lived in the town of Beregost circa .
In 1368 DR, Nettys father was among many disappeared townies who, in reality, were murdered by the addled cleric of Cyric named Basillus. Nettys friend Footy, who lost his brother Johnny and mother under the same circumstances, discovered the clerics whereabouts and promptly rushed back to her to give good news of finding their families, completely missing the fact that they were zombies.
